abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Nancy Dubuc, chief executive of A&E Networks, who discusses her career and management technique.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Dubuc, the chief executive of A&E Networks, tries to get the best out of her teams by balancing them with three types of people. (With video.)

headline.main: Nancy Dubuc of A&E: Mixing Doers, Thinkers and Feelers

snippet: Ms. Dubuc, the chief executive of A&E Networks, tries to get the best out of her teams by balancing them with three types of people. (With video.)
